description:
With Karura gone, Takashi, Shusuke, and Hayato return to their lives. Everything should have gone back to normal. The incident takes place at Takashi`s school. Takashi`s trips to Gretagard become more and more frequent as he comes under stress at school. When he reaches his mental breaking point while working on his graduation anthology with Masako, Takashi leaves for Gretagard before a concerned Asuka`s eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyonyuu no Cream Onee-chan mada Desuka!
巨乳のクリームお姉ちゃんまだですかー!
